data.name: Star Stuff
data.detailed_description:
CONNECT & SHARE


About the Game

Star Stuff is a cosmic coding puzzler that takes place in a factory that fabricates stars and shoots them into space. Play as Mija (me-ha), a bright-eyed engineer, as they tackle their first day on the job. Explore thoughtful levels, code bots, and save your starlien crew! Move freely amongst a mix of coding and fun puzzle mechanics and learn to take a big problem one step at a time. Shine on, Mija.



TACKLE YOUR FIRST DAY ON THE JOB
Play as Mija, a bright-eyed engineer, at a factory that fabricates stars and shoots them into space.

UNCOVER AN UNRAVELING PROBLEM
Uncover a series of mishaps and find calm in the chaos.



TRAVERSE A PUZZLING STAR FACTORY TO SAVE YOUR CREW
Code bots to help you traverse interesting puzzles!

TAKE A BREATHER
Take delightful breaks in cozy star factory lobbies where you can interact with familiar but curious objects.



YOUR ACTIONS MATTER, MIJA
A tale about taking a big problem step by step.

FEATURES
  • Move freely amongst a mix of coding and fun puzzle mechanics like trampolines and swirling laser machines!
  • Solve 70+ hand-crafted puzzles across a myriad of unique environments.
  • Purposefully designed puzzles that get you thinking!

WARNING
This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: A cosmic puzzle adventure about a young alien’s first day at a star factory. Explore thoughtful levels, code your own bots, and save the ever-expanding universe!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 480/AMD Radeon 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 550 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
